name: End of the line
description:
Your phone has no signal but you need to call for help. These people might also need your help.

In between a point and click and a visual novel, make your way to the tail of the train to try and get some help. Don't forget to check on other passengers though.

This game was done under the 39th Ludum Dare's theme "Out of Power" by Molo (@maoloww) and dorkandy (@dorkandy).
